text: <@U26C29XPH> we have found how to add with hubl the Add to worklow and send follow up email
but we failed to found out how to include the send form notifications instead of the form defaults
we have asked here a couple of times but it seems no one has this problem solved

this is the code working for follow up option
simple_email_for_live_id="{{ module.followupemail_field }}"
       form_follow_ups_follow_up_type="simple"
This one for workflows options
form_follow_ups_workflow_id = {{ module.workflow_field }}
and this for notifications but in this case is not working
notifications_are_overridden=True
           notifications_override_email_addresses =[{{ module.email_field }} (edited)
We have managed to include emails for notification with
notifications_are_overridden=True
          notifications_override_email_addresses =["<mailto:jedwar@inboundemotion.com|jedwar@inboundemotion.com>", "<mailto:jnavarrete@inboundemotion.com|jnavarrete@inboundemotion.com>"]
but this means you have to code in the module every mail you want to send notification, the option does not appear in the settings
This is a major issue as it's very convinient using forms within custom modules but you need the 3 options available to have the proper settings for user actions in a landing built this way

Thanks <@U2Q5LPHGS> I also see there is a Followup email field. I'm guessing maybe we are suppose to add that separately from the form module? Still weird that the form module doesn't act the same as it does normally when outside a custom module.
I'll try the code you provided. I appreciate it!
Is it possible to get Testimonials added to the Functions under the Filter Tags? Seems like a standard one that should be listed?
Unless I'm misunderstanding the purpose of this.
issue: the tabs in the design manager, randomly switch to italics * indicating unsaved changes, when they're no changes to be saved. It's been doing this since day one :slightly_smiling_face:
